text: A 36 - year - old Australian climber is dead after falling about 150 metres at Aoraki Mount Cook. The man, from Hampton East, fell in the Tasman Glacier area. A Westpac Rescue Helicopter from Christchurch was called about 3pm to assist with search and rescue co - ordination at the Mt Cook base. When it got there, the man had been transported to Mt Cook Village by a local helicopter service and pronounced dead by paramedics. The man is thought to have fallen much earlier in the day.
title: Climber dead after Aoraki Mount Cook fall.
